data.name: ConfirmRegistrationEmailExplanation
data.value: You have received this message because you have recently registered an account.

data.name: ConfirmRegistrationEmailText
data.value: Confirm your email address by clicking on the button below. This step increases the security of your business by confirming that you are the owner of this email address.

data.name: ConfirmRecoverPasswordEmailText
data.value: Confirm the reset of the old password by clicking on the button below. This step will delete your old password and allow you to set a new one.

data.name: ConfirmRecoverPasswordEmailExplanation
data.value: You received this email because you requested to restore your password.

data.name: ConfirmMailChangeEmailText
data.value: Confirm the change of your email address to a new one by clicking on the button below.

data.name: ConfirmMailChangeEmailExplanation
data.value: You received this email because you requested a change of email address.

data.name: LinkExpires
data.value: The link expires 24 hours after receiving the email.
